home.notes: LCP optimized with CSS gradient hero. DoctorCard image has priority. Lazy loading used effectively for below-fold content.

location.notes: Static generation used. Map component uses facade pattern to prevent iframe blocking. TrustProof is lightweight.

condition.notes: LCP candidate (Hero Image) lacked `sizes` attribute, potentially causing suboptimal image resource selection.

appointment.notes: Heavy client components (PatientPortal, ChatBot) are lazy loaded. Background blob uses CSS.

bottleneck_identified.description: Hero Image on Condition pages uses `next/image` with explicit width/height but missing `sizes` prop. This can lead to browsers downloading larger-than-necessary images on some viewports, delaying LCP.

fix_implemented.description: Added `sizes="(min-width: 1024px) 500px, 100vw"` to the Hero Image in `app/conditions/[conditionSlug]/page.tsx`.
fix_implemented.expected_impact: Browsers can now select the appropriate image size from the srcset. On mobile devices, it ensures the image width matches viewport width efficiently. On desktop, it ensures the image matches the column width (~500px) instead of potentially larger intrinsic sizes.
fix_implemented.verification: Inspect source code of condition pages to verify `sizes` attribute is present on the `img` tag.
